description.en: A Turkish premium anime watching website with resolution boost, spesific subtitle placement and other features.
description.tr: 4k yüksek çözünürlük artırma, özel altyazı yerleştirme ve diğer özelliklere sahip, Türkçe premium anime izleme sitesi.

settings.title: Show Buttons
settings.description: Shows/hides the 'View Episode' or 'View Anime' buttons on your Discord status.

settings.title: Show Posters
settings.description: Toggles the display of anime and studio posters on your Discord status. If disabled, the Anizium logo will be shown instead.

settings.title: Icon
settings.description: Select the type of Anizium logo to use when posters are hidden or unavailable.

settings.title: Watching Details (Line 1)
settings.description: Customize the first line of text on your Discord status when watching an anime.

settings.title: Watching Details (Line 2)
settings.description: Customize the second line of text on your Discord status when watching an anime.

settings.title: Show Timestamps
settings.description: Shows/hides the elapsed and remaining time on your Discord status when watching an episode.
